alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 11 at 3:56AM PDT until April 11 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Humboldt County, Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County and Southwest Elko County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. A few power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Periods of blowing snow and or blowing dust are likely during this event, which may result in reduced visibilities at times.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Southwest Elko County
